methods.name: Focus
methods.description: Sets focus on the widget element, if it can be focused and keyboardOperation=true

methods.name: GetValueBool
methods.description: Get value dependent on state. false -> not checked, true -> checked.

methods.name: GetValueInteger
methods.description: Get value dependent on state0 -> not checked, 1 -> checked.

methods.name: RemoveImage
methods.description: Remove an image.

methods.name: RemoveMouseDownText
methods.description: Remove mouseDownText.

methods.name: RemoveText
methods.description: Remove text.

methods.name: setBreakWord
methods.description: Sets the value for break word.

methods.name: setEditable
methods.description:
Sets the state of property «editable»
Used for «editable» binding; method is called exclusevely by the framework

methods.name: setEllipsis
methods.description: Sets the value if ellipsis should be used.

methods.name: SetEnable
methods.description: Sets the state of property «enable»

methods.name: SetImage
methods.description: Sets an image.

methods.name: setImageAlign
methods.description: Sets the value for image align.

methods.name: SetMouseDownImage
methods.description: Sets the image when mouse down

methods.name: SetMouseDownText
methods.description: Sets the visible text for pressed state. This method can remove an optional textkey.

parameter.name: keepKey
parameter.description: Set true, if textkey should not be removed

methods.name: setMouseDownTextKey
methods.description: set the textkey for mouseDownText

methods.name: setMultiLine
methods.description: Sets the value for multiLine.

methods.name: setParentCoWiId
methods.description: Used to inherit parentCoWiId inside of compound widgets to inner widgets which are not projected, e.g. inner widgets of Login widget

methods.name: SetStyle
setTabIndex
methods.description: Sets the state of property «tabIndex»

methods.name: SetText
methods.description: Sets the visible text. This method can remove an optional textkey.

parameter.name: keepKey
parameter.description: Set true, if textkey should not be removed

methods.name: setTextKey
methods.description: set the textkey

methods.name: setUseSVGStyling
methods.description: Sets useSVGStyling

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description:
Toggle button dependent of a value.
This method is used for binding.

methods.name: SetValueBool
methods.description: Toggle button dependent of a value. false -> not checked, true -> checked.

methods.name: SetValueInteger
methods.description: Toggle button dependent of a value. 0 -> not checked, 1 -> checked.

methods.name: SetVisible
methods.description: Sets the state of property «visible»

methods.name: setWordWrap
methods.description: Sets the value for word wrap.

methods.name: ShowTooltip

events.name: Click
events.description: Fired when element is clicked on.

parameter.name: origin
parameter.description: id of widget that triggered this event

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: DisabledClick
events.description: Fired when disabled element is clicked on.

parameter.name: origin
parameter.description: id of widget that triggered this event

parameter.name: hasPermission
parameter.description: defines if the state is caused due to missing roles of the current user

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: DoubleClick
events.description: Fired when element has double click.

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of click in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: EnableChanged
events.description: Fired when operability of the widget changes.

events.name: FocusIn
events.description: Fired when the widgets gets focus

events.name: FocusOut
events.description: Fired when the widgets lost focus

events.name: MouseDown
events.description: Fired when widget enters mouseDown state

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of mouse in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of mouse in pixel i.e '10px'

events.name: MouseUp
events.description: Fired when widget enters mouseUp state

parameter.name: horizontalPos
parameter.description: horizontal position of mouse in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: verticalPos
parameter.description: vertical position of mouse in pixel i.e '10px'

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget where the drag operation has ended

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget where the drag operation has ended

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been entering the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been entering the droppable widget

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been leaving the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been leaving the droppable widget

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget where the drag operation has been started

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget where the drag operation has been started

parameter.name: contentId
parameter.description: content id of the widget that has been dropped on the droppable widget

parameter.name: widgetId
parameter.description: id of the widget that has been dropped on the droppable widget

events.name: ValueChanged
events.description: Fired when the status of the widget is changed by user interaction

events.name: VisibleChanged
events.description: Fired when the visibility of the widget changes.

properties.name: breakWord
properties.description: Allows lines to be broken within words if an otherwise unbreakable string is too long to fit.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Make widget draggable.

properties.name: ellipsis
properties.description: If true, overflow of text is symbolized with an ellipsis. This option has no effect, if wordWrap = true.

properties.name: enable
properties.description: Initial option to enable widget.

properties.name: image
properties.description: Path to an optional image.

properties.name: imageAlign
properties.description: Position of image relative to text.

properties.name: mouseDownImage
properties.description: Path to an optional image to be shown in 'checked' state.

properties.name: mouseDownText
properties.description: Text which is displayed in the widget when pressed

properties.name: multiLine
properties.description:
If true, more than one line is possible.
Text will wrap when necessary (if property wordWrap is set to true) or at explicit line breaks (\n).
If false, text will never wrap to the next line. The text continues on the same line.

properties.name: permissionOperate
properties.description: restricts operability to users, which have given roles

properties.name: permissionView
properties.description: restricts visibility to users, which have given roles

properties.name: style
properties.description: reference to a style for this widget type

properties.name: tabIndex
properties.description:
sets if a widget should have autofocus enabled (0), the order of the focus (>0),
or if autofocus should be disabled (-1)

properties.name: text
properties.description: Text which is displayed in the widget

properties.name: tooltip
properties.description: reference to a tooltip for a widget

properties.name: useSVGStyling
properties.description: Define if the image stylings (i.e imageColor) are applied - only valid when SVG Images are used.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Represents the boolean state of the element.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: change visibility

properties.name: wordWrap
properties.description:
If true, text will wrap when necessary.
This property has no effect, if multiLine=false

properties.name: imageHeight
properties.description: height of the image

properties.name: imageWidth
properties.description: width of the image

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.description: maximum outer height of widget

properties.name: minHeight
properties.description: minimum outer height of widget

properties.name: maxWidth
properties.description: maximum outer width of widget

properties.name: minWidth
properties.description: minimum outer width of widget

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description:
The zIndex property specifies the z-order of a widget and its childs.
When widgets overlap, z-order determines which one covers the other. A widget with a larger zIndex generally covers a widget with a lower one.
The zIndex must be unique within a content.

properties.name: left
properties.description: absolute position measured from left boundary of parent container

properties.name: top
properties.description: absolute position measured from top boundary of parent container

properties.name: height
properties.description: outer height of widget

properties.name: width
properties.description: outer width of widget

descriptions.de: Schaltet einen Wert zwischen true und false wenn der Benutzer darauf klickt
descriptions.en: Toggles a value between true and false when the user clicks it
